data.text: @TheBernician Then @MattHancock ends it all with a love story 👀

@TheBernician There seems no further depths @MattHancock can fall after such despicable Midazolam policies & expenditure that tragically & criminally ended thousands of lives before their time these 2 years - but stepping into the WEF cess pool marks a new low! #Midazolam

@TheBernician Send the evidence pack to @MattHancock house and his childrens school in North London. Especially as his paying 20+k per kid in school fees. He lives in a 1.5m+ house in Queens Park. I'd claim an AML investigation. PEP? His on 150k a year.
@TheBernician Another one that’s sold his soul,beggars belief. I’m truly lost for words
